page.description: Definition of a line in a layout in the control bar.

property.name: className
property.description: The class name to put on the element that contains the layout line.

property.name: before
property.description: The "before" part of the layout line. In a horizontal layout this will be left, in a vertical top.

property.name: items
property.description: An array of item names to show in the "before" part.

property.name: middle
property.description: The "middle" part of the layout line.

property.name: items
property.description: An array of item names to show in the "middle" part.

property.name: after
property.description: The "after" part of the layout line. In a horizontal layout this will be right, in a vertical bottom.

property.name: items
property.description: An array of item names to show in the "after" part.
